prerequisites: Prerequisite: Latin 103 with a grade of at least C- or placement
summary: Students will consolidate their knowledge of the Latin language through a variety of readings of extended passages of both prose and poetry, supplemented by composition exercises. Attention will be paid to matters of literary style, context, and, where appropriate, meter. By the end of the course, students should be able to navigate the Latin language from the classical period with understanding and confidence.
title: Intermediate Latin Prose and Poetry
